item.description:
This meeting will be held at a cafe next to the Symphony T stop on the Green Line.

Time: 8 pm - 9 pm

Come meet with other members of the Boston Digital Arts group to learn more about the field of digital arts. We'll discuss the types of work available in the Boston area, including graphic design, web design, photography, and video. We'll also talk about the colleges and training centers in the area that have digital arts programs. I'll try to invite representatives and bring literature.

I would like to open the discussion to working professionals, educators, students, and hobbyists. If you have questions to ask or would like to contribute, please RSVP!

This event is free.

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Digital Arts Educational and Career Opportunities
